text:
So... I'm not great with talking about myself at length, but here it goes anyway. I'm 23 years old, 6"2" 170 pounds with an athletic build, clean (drug and disease free; and you need to be too), and I have long dark hair. I'd also like to preface by saying that height and weight are not big deals to me. So, that being said...

I'd describe myself as being quiet, perceptive, open minded, spontaneous, wordy, funny/corny-I WILL find a way to make you laugh-down to earth, easygoing and kind-hearted to a fault. A sense of humor is important; I seem to almost always be trying to make people smile. I'm also a die-hard romantic; a firm believer in chivalry; I pride myself on being a gentleman; and I always make time for that special someone. I'm originally from Manhattan, but I've spent most of my life in South Florida. I graduated high school as salutatorian and class president, and I'm currently a student majoring in English, with a minor in European History, at the University of West Florida (UWF). Literature brings me to life-The Picture of Dorian Gray is my Holy Bible, and "The Raven" is my Lord's Prayer. It's my dream to make a career out of writing, however, if need be I can find work in publishing and film through my connections.

As for my interests, I enjoy Netflix/Hulu, 420, reading, writing, video games, science and the nature of the universe in general, and doing anything out of the ordinary if granted the opportunity-I believe that boredom is the catalyst to the realization that a change is necessary. I'm somewhat of a nerd. I firmly believe that Lord of the Rings will always be better than Star Wars, just as I also believe that Batman is the one man capable of beating Superman (dispute me if you must). When it comes to music, my favorite band is Nightwish, but I also like Aerosmith, Elliott Smith, Florence and the Machine, Steam Powered Giraffe, Miracle of Sound, Postmodern Jukebox, Within Temptation, etc...

As for my intentions... I'm recently home from college for the time being, and I'm looking for someone to help make the next chapter of my life a more interesting one. I don't expect to find true love here, so, for now I'm searching in the realm of possibility for someone whom I can just be with comfortably, laugh with hysterically, and be thrilled by in otherwise dull moments. Most of all I want to find the love of my life, despite the odds. I don't expect to find this much, but being single I've nothing to lose, so why not try?

If you want to know anything else, just ask:)

I enjoy writing poetry...this one seemed appropriate for the occasion:

TRUE BLUE HEART


Can a true blue heart shine just as bright-
If it sparkles in no one else's eyes?
No witness to this day's dance of light,
My emotions, my laughs, my cries.

Unshared memories, beautiful moments
Overlooked in haste.
Like teardrops in the ocean,
Diamonds in the waste.

Lift the covers from your feelings,
Expose your insecure spots.
Show the world what you're made of-
Share the bravest of your thoughts.

The things that we're concealing
Will never let us grow.
To throw ourselves wide open
Can bring us more than we'll ever know.

Open up your arms!
You can show your heart's still true.
Even if the color's almost gone-
A Hue of Faded Blue.

Darrin

title: Very Successful Guy Seeks European Beautiful Woman 4 Good Relationship
text:
I've dated a lot of models throughout the years and that seems to work best for me. So now I'm again looking for a model or actress or drop-dead gorgeous woman to be my girlfriend to have a good relationship with, as well as take to social, business, and even charity events sometimes. 

My colleagues and I are in a business career that what most people would consider of the "filthy rich." -= But I place my deepest values on the things that are important in Life, rather than just material objects. I'm very particular, I'm can very demanding (but Kind ), and I'm used to getting what I want (most of the time, LOL). I've dated and I'm tired of it, so I want to try again and find someone really right this time! 

I want to make someone feel that they are Special . I want to love someone who will bring love and friendship into our relationship, make my peers and colleagues jealous, and who enjoys romance and sexual fulfillment when we have time. I am generous in bed and outside the bed - I am the Fillet Mignon of relationships for the right girl, or woman We will also be doing some traveling occasionally and I'll be working much of the time., though I have a very flexible schedule All I ask is that you try to build a good relationship with me, try to do the best you can to be loved, and make yourself available to me emotionally, physically, spiritually and mentally - plus i enjoy great conversations and humor, fun and excitement. You should be available for me, as I will be available for you, in all ways - Also please be available for occasional parties, events, and intimate moments together - and spending quality time together. You must also love animals as I have two wonderful cats - I like dogs also, just it is so easy with cats who can left on their own for a couple of days or so when necessary. When not with me, you're free to do anything you want, so long as it is not detrimental to our relationship. 

I tried this before on Craigslist and I gave a lot more detail. It didn't work out too well because everyone who read it over-analyzed it. Don't send me e-mails saying I'm not a happy person or that I'll never find love. I really don't care. I want a good relationship with some warmth and humor and love and excitement, and know where I stand rather than have to deal with the typical relationship roller coaster. And I'm looking for a truly good relationship. I want to give and take,to give and receive love and friendship - they say you should be with the love of your life who is your best friend - well, we all know it takes time to find that and when do we, we are truly happy. Nothing better than being in love and loving and being loved back. I'm able to make committments, unlike a lot of guys who seem incapable or fearful of committments. So,I'm looking for a relationship that could hopefully lead to a really good bond., or even eventual marriage, if that happens, and exciting lifestyle together - best case scenario I want to have a wonderful relationship and for YOU to be happy too. Just so you know, I'm not looking to just be someone's sugar daddy. You will be well taken care - I am very generous emotionally and financially,just please dont ask me after one or two dates to pay all your bills. After we get to know each other, anything is possible obviously - after I want to make you happy and content if you are making me happy and content. And by the way, I am happy by myself, so I dont "need" someone to make me happy, it's all inside. I just want to share a wonderful relationship mutually with someone.. 

Requirements: 
1> You must be 20-36 years old. 
2> You must also be able to hold an intelligent conversation or able to not embarrass me if you're part of a conversation you don't understand. 
3> You can be white, latin or black, but you must be eye candy, the more exotic and attractive looking the better; exotic eye candy gets bonus points. 
4> This goes without saying, but you should be unbelievably attractive. 
5> You must be willing to deal with my agrressive nature. I'm used to getting what I want, when I want it. Spend enough time with me and you'll understand because when you have a lot of money, people kiss your ass all the time. I have done the celebrity thing as a former high end musician and I know how shallow and empty the celebrity thing can be. But please get used to people taking our photo a lot because it happens a lot when you are with me.
6> You must be single, or if you have children be a a single parent and have time for us to be together. 
7> You also need to be very patient. I'm opinionated (though flexible, and not over ly controlling) and I'm driven in a business sense and an artistic sense also, as I have business in the high end business world as well as in the Arts, I'm an agressive alpha male type, I have almost no patience sometime and maybe you can help me learn to be more patient , and I'm hugely demanding in almost every aspect of my life. 

If you're still interested: 

1> Tell me about yourself. 
2> Tell me why you think I should choose you. 
3> Describe your best qualities. 
4> Tell me your education level. 
5> Send me at least three pictures of yourself (anything you want... G, PG, PG-13, R, X, XXX, whatever. You choose.) 
6> Tell me a joke or a story... Can you make me laugh? 
7> Tell me something that you think will get me excited about you! (anything you'd like... A story, a secret, a crazy hobby, etc.) 

If you're going to write just to bash me, don't bother. I posted this awhile ago and I've heard it all. If you're serious about taking me up on this , please respond.

title: How's this for a first date?
text:
It is early morning as you are on the way to the airport, sitting in the back of the SUV he sent for you, you see the sun rising . You notice as you drive to the airport the crystal blue skies as the sun rises to start a new day! 

As you pull up the gate opens to let you on the airport grounds you pull around and notice the Falcon jet waiting, door open and steps down. The drivers stops and comes around to open your door and let you out of the SUV. The pilot walks over to greet you and helps with your bag. He takes your light bag and let's you climb aboard the waiting jet. Excited you take your first step into the jet not sure what is around the corner but willing to find out.

You turn to the right and pass the galley. The aircraft is larger than you pictured it from outside. You notice seating for 8. All you really care about is seating for 2. You sit down and wait for your date, looking through a magazine as you wait. 

Your date boards the aircraft; he is tall 6', 175 lbs, blue eyes, athletic build, great smile, he gives you a firm hug and a kiss. You sit down in the plush leather chairs and notice the flowers on the table in front of you. In it is a card that reads. "Welcome aboard, this is the start of a great ride" 

It is 6.30, early yet perfect to take off to destination unknown. 

You have talked to him on the phone, met for drinks and emailed over a period of time and feel you have really gotten to know him, you feel comfortable with him and are ready for this new, fun and exciting adventure. 

The pilot gives you a quick rundown on the safety features shuts the door and heads to the flight deck. You hear the 3 engines start and you slowly start to head out towards the runway. 

You Taxi to the North and stop just short of the runway, it is a wonderful day for flying. You watch as other planes land and you see the small Cessna in front of you head down the run way to take off. 

The Plane slowly makes a turn to the active runway pointing south. You hear the engines getting louder and you slowly start to roll you feel the force of this wonderful aircraft take you down the runway. It seems like only a minute and you 
are airborne! The city is below you as you climb out. 

The climb-out is smooth, the sun is shining and the clouds look like candy as you climb out. You notice that the aircraft is turning to the East. Once again you ask yourself where I am going. 

The conversation is great. You both are comfortable talking about anything and everything from kids to family to dreams. You laugh and enjoy each others company. 

As the plane reaches cruise the screens around the aircraft light up to show where you are and where the closest towns are, it lets you know speed but fails to give you a location of where you will wind up. 

You have a light breakfast and a toast of Champagne to start the day. 

You wonder where we are going. Did I pack the right clothes.... 

In the end it does not matter, you know in your heart you have finally found him. The ride on the plane is like the ride of life, a few bumps along the way.

It does not matter how many bumps there are as long as the person sitting next to you is holding your hand. 

Life is short, enjoy the ride!

title: Very Successful Guy Seeks European Beautiful Woman 4Good Relationship
text:
I've dated a lot of models throughout the years and that seems to work best for me. So now I'm again looking for a model or actress or drop-dead gorgeous woman to be my girlfriend to have a good relationship with, as well as take to social, business, and even charity events sometimes. 

My colleagues and I are in a business career that what most people would consider of the "filthy rich." -= But I place my deepest values on the things that are important in Life, rather than just material objects. I'm very particular, I'm can very demanding (but Kind ), and I'm used to getting what I want (most of the time, LOL). I've dated and I'm tired of it, so I want to try again and find someone really right this time! 

I want to make someone feel that they are Special . I want to love someone who will bring love and friendship into our relationship, make my peers and colleagues jealous, and who enjoys romance and sexual fulfillment when we have time. I am generous in bed and outside the bed - I am the Fillet Mignon of relationships for the right girl, or woman We will also be doing some traveling occasionally and I'll be working much of the time., though I have a very flexible schedule All I ask is that you try to build a good relationship with me, try to do the best you can to be loved, and make yourself available to me emotionally, physically, spiritually and mentally - plus i enjoy great conversations and humor, fun and excitement. You should be available for me, as I will be available for you, in all ways - Also please be available for occasional parties, events, and intimate moments together - and spending quality time together. You must also love animals as I have two wonderful cats - I like dogs also, just it is so easy with cats who can left on their own for a couple of days or so when necessary. When not with me, you're free to do anything you want, so long as it is not detrimental to our relationship. 

I tried this before on Craigslist and I gave a lot more detail. It didn't work out too well because everyone who read it over-analyzed it. Don't send me e-mails saying I'm not a happy person or that I'll never find love. I really don't care. I want a good relationship with some warmth and humor and love and excitement, and know where I stand rather than have to deal with the typical relationship roller coaster. And I'm looking for a truly good relationship. I want to give and take,to give and receive love and friendship - they say you should be with the love of your life who is your best friend - well, we all know it takes time to find that and when do we, we are truly happy. Nothing better than being in love and loving and being loved back. I'm able to make committments, unlike a lot of guys who seem incapable or fearful of committments. So,I'm looking for a relationship that could hopefully lead to a really good bond., or even eventual marriage, if that happens, and exciting lifestyle together - best case scenario I want to have a wonderful relationship and for YOU to be happy too. Just so you know, I'm not looking to just be someone's sugar daddy. You will be well taken care - I am very generous emotionally and financially,just please dont ask me after one or two dates to pay all your bills. After we get to know each other, anything is possible obviously - after I want to make you happy and content if you are making me happy and content. And by the way, I am happy by myself, so I dont "need" someone to make me happy, it's all inside. I just want to share a wonderful relationship mutually with someone.. 

Requirements: 
1> You must be 20-36 years old. 
2> You must also be able to hold an intelligent conversation or able to not embarrass me if you're part of a conversation you don't understand. 
3> You can be white, latin or black, but you must be eye candy, the more exotic and attractive looking the better; exotic eye candy gets bonus points. 
4> This goes without saying, but you should be unbelievably attractive. 
5> You must be willing to deal with my agrressive nature. I'm used to getting what I want, when I want it. Spend enough time with me and you'll understand because when you have a lot of money, people kiss your ass all the time. I have done the celebrity thing as a former high end musician and I know how shallow and empty the celebrity thing can be. But please get used to people taking our photo a lot because it happens a lot when you are with me.
6> You must be single, or if you have children be a a single parent and have time for us to be together. 
7> You also need to be very patient. I'm opinionated (though flexible, and not over ly controlling) and I'm driven in a business sense and an artistic sense also, as I have business in the high end business world as well as in the Arts, I'm an agressive alpha male type, I have almost no patience sometime and maybe you can help me learn to be more patient , and I'm hugely demanding in almost every aspect of my life. 

If you're still interested: 

1> Tell me about yourself. 
2> Tell me why you think I should choose you. 
3> Describe your best qualities. 
4> Tell me your education level. 
5> Send me at least three pictures of yourself (anything you want... G, PG, PG-13, R, X, XXX, whatever. You choose.) 
6> Tell me a joke or a story... Can you make me laugh? 
7> Tell me something that you think will get me excited about you! (anything you'd like... A story, a secret, a crazy hobby, etc.) 

If you're going to write just to bash me, don't bother. I posted this awhile ago and I've heard it all. If you're serious about taking me up on this , please respond.

title: Everyone has baggage, what's yours?
text:
The only ones that don't have some sort of "baggage" are the ones that never had any invested interest in a real relationship, and if you never have before, what makes you suddenly want to go on this emotional trip now? The key is to find someone else that theirs fits in well with yours. You don't bring high heels when going camping in the woods, and don't pack an extra heavy winter coat when heading for someplace tropical. And it's not just matching luggage either, it's trying to complete each other them having what you need, and you having what they need in return. Life and especially relationships are a long journey, not a trip to a day spa or mall.

I've never asked for much in a woman, all I want is some simple things, like you knowing the difference between "your" and "you're", and knowing that "ur" is -not- really a word... I want to find someone close enough to my age if it's to turn serious, if you're not sure if you're close enough in age, feel free to respond anyways, I'll be as gentle as I can about it if not. I do like women that are older than me , younger is fine too. Your physical shape truly doesn't matter to me, I'm attracted to a woman's inner beauty, and want someone similar, that would want me for who I am rather than my body shape, or what size I am between the legs, or what I have in my bank...
I am a highly affectionate guy, I love snuggling up close to someone I'm dating just because they're there, don't need any other reason why than that, so it'd be best if you were like that too.

Do -not- send me a picture, I don't have any to send you, so please don't ask either. We can meet in safe, public place like they did long before the internet was invented, and like you still do today.

Bonus points (but not required) if you:
are more dominant (at least in the bedroom)
don't have any children yet (any on the way count)
are at least a little geekish (if you hear "roleplay" and at least sometimes think games instead of bedroom activities, you kinda are)

title: Single dad looking to get married...
text:
Hi,

I've been single and dating, but haven't met the right one yet. I don't get out as much as I would like, so it's difficult to meet new people, so I'm using Craigslist as another venue of meeting people. Ultimately, I am looking to get married. I'm not the serial dating kind of guy and hope to find the right match who is also looking for a long term relationship. 

Please note I'm looking for someone who can relocate to the Raleigh, NC area.

I like to think of myself as an easy going, laid back kind of guy. I love to laugh and have a pretty good sense of humor; I can be a bit sarcastic at times too. I like to think of myself as one of the "good guys" and that I have a lot of the qualities women look for. . . see below!

I have an incredible 7 year old daughter who means the world to me and is a big part of my life whom I share custody of with her mother. 

The past 7 years have been hectic to say the least. I spent the majority of my time focusing on my daughter and doing projects around the house I purchased in '09. Now that my goofball is getting older and the projects around the house are just about completed, I finally have time to myself and hopefully I can meet someone to spend time with, possibly start a relationship and with a little luck, share my life with. It would be nice to meet someone with a little one in the 5-8 year range! We have a pool in the back yard and live a block away from one of the best elementary schools in the area.

Some of the things I enjoy are spending time with my daughter, anything to do with the outdoors such as camping, fishing, boating, motorcycles, trips to the beach and back yard barbecues. Like most, I enjoy a night out with friends, dinner/drinks, catching a movie, live band or just staying in on a cold night, having dinner and curling up with someone special and watching a movie.

I would like to meet someone that is honest, caring, silly at times, and has a good sense of humor as well; Someone who understands that communication and trust are part of the foundation for a solid relationship. And someone who considers themselves a true romantic and believes that it's the little things in a relationship that are important.

Now on to some of those qualities I mentioned. . .

1. I can fix stuff! Not only can I fix stuff, but I can do so without involving the police, ambulances or insurance companies! Computers, cars, home repairs and especially toddler toys!
2. I can reach stuff that's high and also put the ornament on top of the tree without a ladder!
3. I'm a gentleman. . . with values and morals. I'm also kind, considerate and caring.
4. I'm in the process of raising the most incredible, intelligent, well-mannered, beautiful little girl and I haven't broken her yet!
5. I have never been unfaithful to anyone I've dated and can promise you that you would not be the first.
6. I'm in touch with my feminine side. . . you, me, candles, a hot bubble bath and bottle of wine is the perfect way to spend an evening. Bath toys, including a rubber ducky are optional.
7. I truly believe that the small gestures in a relationship are important. . . (and something I miss)
8. I understand that a relationship is 50/50 and that it requires communication, trust and honesty.
9. I love animals. Right now, we have a 75 gallon community fish tank, a year and a half old sable German Shepherd and a ball python. Yes, my daughter wanted a snake... she's that cool :)
10. I can cook! I'm not a chef, but I enjoy cooking and trying new recipes. Again, haven't broken my daughter yet :)
11. I love cuddling :)

Also, I typically try to work out regularly, but have been slacking and just started going again. I'm 6'2, 225 lbs and on the athletic/muscular side. I'm not a gym rat, I'm just trying to keep myself in a shape other than round. I have a love/hate relationship with the gym, but at this age, it's a necessary evil.

With that being said, there are a few physical features that I tend to find attractive and look for in a woman. In no particular order: Long hair. . . it's something I've always found attractive in a woman and typically notice first; eyes, smile and fitness. . . I do prefer a woman who falls into the slim to average category. More importantly, I'm looking for a woman who has values, morals and considers themselves "good people". 

If you would like to talk, you know what to do :)

I came here, June 2nd 2014, from Washington state. I'm looking for anything from friends, to casual fun, to the love of my life. I'm just rolling with whatever happens, hoping for the best, and seeing where I end up.

I can laugh about damn near anything, which is amazing given all I've been through...though maybe it's because of all I've been.

My hobbies include a wide range of outdoor activities like camping and hiking, mountains and beaches. At home I'm a gamer who watches a lot of movies and TV shows, when not playing with my dog, Sadey. She's an American Staffordshire Terrier (pit bull) and she's friggin amazing. As for me, I've got only one thing to offer. Me. Fortunately, that's quite a bit. I've struggled far more than most can ever imagine. It's made me stronger, smarter, and kinder than the rest. Generous, passionate, and stubborn.

title: Do any of you women really know what you want?
text:
Let me honest with ourselves here.
I have two questions for you to ask yourself before you continue on reading.

1) Do you honestly know who you are?

2) Do you really know what you want as you browse these ads and read mine?

Granted, most of you are probably reading these ads for entertainment value, which I completely understand, but every so often an ad will catch your eye. Kind of like this one. 

So please think about it before you reply, because I am hoping if you do reply to my ad, it will be a very genuine reply. A reply which required a little thought and not just a simple one line reply that would in no way capture my interest.

I am asking this question because recently I went out on three dates, two of which answered a previous ad on here. When I asked them, "Who are you?" "When you look at yourself in the mirror, how do you see you?" They couldn't answer me, when I asked that simple question, I saw in their eyes that they really didn't know the answer.

As for me.

I am an adventurer, world traveler, published author, entrepreneur, avid outdoorsman, DIY creator, rock music enthusiast (Anybody want to AC/DC with me?), blues guitar lover, research engineer, professional road trip guru (yes I was paid for it), a damn good cook when I have someone to cook for, certified masseuse, a snorkeler and scuba diver, master in the language art of Spanglish (I am a master because all the Latin people laugh with me), amateur nature photographer, and an overall laid back guy who is a happy drunk and will do anything I can to get a laugh out of you (but I don't drink that often). 

Besides all of that I do carry a regular job to pay the bills. Even though it's well paying, it doesn't take a lot of brain power to do what I do with my experience, which leaves me more time and brain power to be me.

I do what I have to do so I can do what I want to...sometimes I work hard, but I always play harder!

Overall, life does suck sometimes and life is always hard. I've had it harder than most, but I learned how not to let it get me down and to keep pushing forward. I'm hoping to find someone I can click with on several levels to enjoy the experiences I can find here in South Florida and other places as well.

If you've made it to the end, I hope you're both intrigued by the ad and also deep in thought about how you're going to answer it. I am an honest person and will say I'm not asking this question out of ego, spite, or any other psychological game. I am hoping to connect with someone who is genuinely confident with who they are, who is comfortable in their own skin, and can simply be themselves all the time instead of being who or what they think someone else wants.

I hope that you do write me, and I hope that we do connect and open each other up to new experiences.

title: Why I'll never succeed in the W4M forum!
text:
I've been an avid reader, occasional poster and extremely rare responder of the Craigslist personals for about a year now, and I've noticed some common (and hilarious) threads of interest among the women of FL. I'd like to take a minute to break it down for you, ghetto style, so you can recognize the following horrific cliches and just maybe avoid getting flagged as spam.

ReadySetGo!!!!

"Seeking a man that's at least 6 feet tall. I like to wear high heels" -- Damn, totally boned here. I'm only 5'10 or maybe 5'11′, apparently equaling "somewhere between midget and elf, and therefore undatable", even though the average American male height is 5'10. And 6 feet tall? What kind of shoes are you wearing anyway? Some shit from the lunar landing? Next. . .

"Must love animals" -- Great. . . You mean I have to pretend to like your floofy poodle/chihuahua/norway rat mixed breed long enough to maybe earn some kisses? Or that huge mastiff that's physically capable of kicking me out of your bed? How about the cat that's contemplating using my balls as a scratching post every time I walk around in my boxers? I think I'll exit stage right before the fucker eats my socks again.

"Looking for a God-fearing man" -- I get the biggest kick out of this one. Why would you be afraid of your own imaginary friend? Seems like you'd better imagine something a little less hostile. I'd suggest Papa Smurf.

"Must like the outdoors" -- Barring a select few dweebs I've met that live in their parents' basement and mainline Mountain Dew so they can play World of Warcraft for 87 hours straight, most human beings like being outside at some point. Sure, I'll go for a day hike with you. Does that mean I want to live in the woods for a month and wipe my ass with a pine cone? No thanks!

"Looking for friends first" -- Cool, I'm always down for more friends. Wait, what's that you say? Your hot friend Brittany is single? Excuse me while I ask her for her phone number.

"Must love children" -- Unlike the mighty lion (who will kill and eat cubs from rival males) I say the more kids, the better! We can open our own sweatshop and they can make you shoes. I call being the manager!

"I like having fun" -- Whew, what a relief! I'm meeting too many people these days that think having fun sucks. I'm a big fan of fun myself! We have so much in common.

"Must like to dance" -- Really? Have you ever met a straight guy that wants to go dancing? Wait, I take that back. I do know one guy, but he's from Puerto Rico or something. Come to think of it, he's probably gay. That's right, Jorge -- I've got you figured out.

"I like going out, but also enjoy staying in for a quiet night at home" -- That's great, because staying home or going out and doing something are pretty much the only two options you have.

So in conclusion, I say the luck of the Irish be with you lovely ladies of FL in your search for a badass Daniel Craig-era James Bond lookalike that will dance the Macarena with Mr. Cuddlekins the Poodle whilst purchasing you an all-expenses-paid vacation to Maui. Just keep in mind that Mr. Bond is only 5'10.

Or you can drop me a line and we can chat.

title: Comfortable, educated, alpha man seeks a relocatable mate
text:
I have written a lot of posts on CL over the years. After many dates and one or two false starts, I believe I've refined the person that would be a great fit for me. In the end, knowing what you want and actually being able to articulate it can be the greatest challenge. That is except NOW finding THE ONE! 
Chronologically, I'm 59, mentally, I'm probably older, spiritually still a babe and socially maybe I just grew up. As far as the social "criteria" goes here's my list: Doctorate in Law, B.A. in English, half a Masters in Creative Writing. I've been a Univ. Teacher; Lawyer, Journalist; antiques auctioneer; boat captain; jazz musician (still play almost every day and do one gig per week); and for the past 17 years, I've been the owner of a publishing company and Internet site focused primarily on news. I have a wall full of plaques that are supposed to attest to my "position" in the community and the world at large but they never meant that much to me as the harshest judge of me is ME.
I am in the process of retiring this year and have already sold most of my business interests and plan to take it easy and see the world. I do have three children from my single marriage and nine grandkids that I love so I can't get "lost" forever but I am free to do as I want and have the ability to capitalize on that freedom; a rare combination for most people; I'm blessed.
Financially I'm in great shape overall. I have saved enough money to live comfortably my remaining years; I own two nice homes, one with a private lake and in the country (I love to spend time in the country and am probably a country boy at heart. I love gardens fishing cuddling with a movie and taking walks for fitness and relaxation). Definitely not a big city man though I am at ease in the city but find it too crowded unfriendly and stressful overall. 
I also have a commercial office building two minutes from a Florida Beach; everything I own is paid for and I have way above average credit that I rarely use except to get points for travel. I eat a lot of organic and while I don't spend much on name brand goods, I spend liberally on travel, great food and drink and have always been a fantastic provider for my household which I hope soon includes you.
Physically I am overweight but still look good because I was athletic for many years and still have good musculature. I can walk five country miles and swim a mile back to back and love to scuba as I am a qualified rescue diver. All my hair, teeth and everything works with no "issues". No medications for anything and hardly ever take even an aspirin. I have always liked to drink and still drink too much but I am certainly no drunken alcoholic. I don't drink during the day and sometimes go days without but I do like my beer and wine OH and champagne. . ..! 
I write a few hours each day, practice music and exercise about an hour. These are my non-variables.
The down side: I did drugs for many years; smoked too much (now only a rare cigar). I was suspended from law practice for several years because of my drug involvement -- coke -- but was not disbarred. I have been arrested (28 years ago for drugs) but it has never stopped my successes and anyway, I later received a Governor's Pardon and it really has never impeded anything I wanted to do. Perhaps because one of my best qualities is also on the down side list -- I am self-motivated sometimes to a fault. I have great references today including the Sheriff of my county and many prominent men whom I've had the pleasure of working with on projects of importance but I am not a saint and don't want a saint and though I am an imperfect Christian I don't wear it on my sleeve and do not want anyone sermonizing me or waiving morality in my face. Life is too shore and I want to enjoy it. 
I love sex but have had a lot of vanilla and now like things more uninhibited. I would love to find a lady who wouldn't mind stretching out in this regard. Perhaps bi-curious but definitely a freak between the sheets. Traveling internationally opens up a lot of possibilities for us to explore our sexuality and this is one of the things I've learned about myself. I cannot be with just one woman foregoing all others. I can be loyal to one woman and she can be my queen and only one living with me but for fun. . ..well, I want more. If you seek vanilla. . .I'm not the one. . ..a multi-flavored Neapolitan is my style. I don't want a mousy lady, but dominant won't work with me as I am a natural Dom and Alpha male, so submissive or neutral is great. That doesn't mean you can't get on top as I enjoy letting my lady run with her spirit as long as I feel respected and in charge. If you are sexy, smart (must be able to converse and have some wit) free to go and see the world and can go from jeans to gown to nude without compunction, we might have a fit. The BIG upside: I have enough dough to cover us both. If you have something to chip in please do but I got this. I do love the Credence Clearwater line. "You don't need a penny, just to hang around, but if you have a nickel, better lay your money down. 
I took time to write this and put though into it. Reply the same. I don't mind doing a rescue; I don't care about your past as much as I care about how you see your future. Think you need a real change, see me, I'm real and waiting. 
Send a full length photo or two and a detailed reply about your current situation including a synopsis of your sexuality. If we look like a fit, I'll reply with photos. If you like me, we can go to phone calls leading to a meet. I'm a man of action so no endless texters, sexters or computer avatars need apply.
Why Craigslist? Well why not, yes it is full of flakes but it reaches a LOT of people and I have met several great women on here they just couldn't pack up and travel around for a year or two and that's where my head is at. Also, I do know how to quickly separate the flakes, address collectors, email stealers, sex site solicitors and so on so don't waste your time though I know many will simply because they are not even reading this book I've written. I found the way to the heart. Life trialed me. Life gave me incredible challenges, because the path to the Kingdom of God Inside is the hardest of them all. How do I know I entered that kingdom? title: Very Successful Guy Seeks Arm Candy for a Good Relationship
text:
I've dated a lot of models throughout the years and that seems to work best for me. So now I'm again looking for a model or actress or drop-dead gorgeous woman to be my girlfriend to have a good relationship with, as well as take to social, business, and even charity events sometimes. 

My colleagues and I are in a business career that what most people would consider of the "filthy rich." -= But I place my deepest values on the things that are important in Life, rather than just material objects. I'm very particular, I'm can very demanding (but Kind ), and I'm used to getting what I want (most of the time, LOL). I've dated and I'm tired of it, so I want to try again and find someone really right this time! 

I want to make someone feel that they are Special . I want to love someone who will bring love and friendship into our relationship, make my peers and colleagues jealous, and who enjoys romance and sexual fulfillment when we have time. I am generous in bed and outside the bed - I am the Fillet Mignon of relationships for the right girl, or woman We will also be doing some traveling occasionally and I'll be working much of the time., though I have a very flexible schedule All I ask is that you try to build a good relationship with me, try to do the best you can to be loved, and make yourself available to me emotionally, physically, spiritually and mentally - plus i enjoy great conversations and humor, fun and excitement. You should be available for me, as I will be available for you, in all ways - Also please be available for occasional parties, events, and intimate moments together - and spending quality time together. You must also love animals as I have two wonderful cats - I like dogs also, just it is so easy with cats who can left on their own for a couple of days or so when necessary. When not with me, you're free to do anything you want, so long as it is not detrimental to our relationship. 

I tried this before on Craigslist and I gave a lot more detail. It didn't work out too well because everyone who read it over-analyzed it. Don't send me e-mails saying I'm not a happy person or that I'll never find love. I really don't care. I want a good relationship with some warmth and humor and love and excitement, and know where I stand rather than have to deal with the typical relationship roller coaster. And I'm looking for a truly good relationship. I want to give and take,to give and receive love and friendship - they say you should be with the love of your life who is your best friend - well, we all know it takes time to find that and when do we, we are truly happy. Nothing better than being in love and loving and being loved back. I'm able to make committments, unlike a lot of guys who seem incapable or fearful of committments. So,I'm looking for a relationship that could hopefully lead to a really good bond., or even eventual marriage, if that happens, and exciting lifestyle together - best case scenario I want to have a wonderful relationship and for YOU to be happy too. Just so you know, I'm not looking to just be someone's sugar daddy. You will be well taken care - I am very generous emotionally and financially,just please dont ask me after one or two dates to pay all your bills. After we get to know each other, anything is possible obviously - after I want to make you happy and content if you are making me happy and content. And by the way, I am happy by myself, so I dont "need" someone to make me happy, it's all inside. I just want to share a wonderful relationship mutually with someone.. 

Requirements: 
1> You must be 20-36 years old. 
2> You must also be able to hold an intelligent conversation or able to not embarrass me if you're part of a conversation you don't understand. 
3> You can be white, latin or black, but you must be eye candy, the more exotic and attractive looking the better; exotic eye candy gets bonus points. 
4> This goes without saying, but you should be unbelievably attractive. 
5> You must be willing to deal with my agrressive nature. I'm used to getting what I want, when I want it. Spend enough time with me and you'll understand because when you have a lot of money, people kiss your ass all the time. I have done the celebrity thing as a former high end musician and I know how shallow and empty the celebrity thing can be. But please get used to people taking our photo a lot because it happens a lot when you are with me.
6> You must be single, or if you have children be a a single parent and have time for us to be together. 
7> You also need to be very patient. I'm opinionated (though flexible, and not over ly controlling) and I'm driven in a business sense and an artistic sense also, as I have business in the high end business world as well as in the Arts, I'm an agressive alpha male type, I have almost no patience sometime and maybe you can help me learn to be more patient , and I'm hugely demanding in almost every aspect of my life. 

If you're still interested: 

1> Tell me about yourself. 
2> Tell me why you think I should choose you. 
3> Describe your best qualities. 
4> Tell me your education level. 
5> Send me at least three pictures of yourself (anything you want... G, PG, PG-13, R, X, XXX, whatever. You choose.) 
6> Tell me a joke or a story... Can you make me laugh? 
7> Tell me something that you think will get me excited about you! (anything you'd like... A story, a secret, a crazy hobby, etc.) 

If you're going to write just to bash me, don't bother. I posted this awhile ago and I've heard it all. If you're serious about taking me up on this , please respond.

title: Trying something different. (You're looking for different, right?)
text:
So here's what goes through my mind when I read a post on CL:

1)- Are you real? Yes I am. 

2)- Why are you on craigslist? The same reasons you are. It's becoming a lot easier to connect with people online than face-to-face. Plus it's more convenient to make a post while I watch a movie than to spend a night at a club / bar. 

3)- Are you normal? Sane? Hygienic? Yes, yes, and yes.

4)- What's the catch? Well... I'm a little shy and introverted.

5)- What are you looking for? I'm looking for an exchange of e-mails that'll lead to coffee which could lead to us getting to know each other.

6)- Ideal date? Some beers, maybe some 420, and an honest conversation.

7)- Wait. 420? Are you a pothead? No. I have a nice place, a college degree, a car, and an awesome job. I just happen to enjoy a little 420 after a long day.

Hopefully I can hear back from at least ONE cool girl.

title: Passion? Where did that go?
text:
Hi.

Just sitting around thinking about a word: "PASSION".

We are all so caught up in life's circle. That's the eat, sleep and work cycle that I think we forgot about this word.

Being single, at times I just throw up my hands with frustration when it comes to dating. The texting relationships where you never meet. The untrue stories and photo's that when you do finally get together you ask yourself, "Who was that". 

Wouldn't it just be nice to meet someone who's an adult, a person who's genuine, one that wants to communicate and touch someone's life. Have someone to think about during the day, communicate with, listen to, hold hands with, and have passionate thoughts about for when you are together? 

Butterflies in one's stomach. What happened to feeling these?

I'd love to just spend time with someone who I could look in to their eyes, hold their hand and just feel good about the place we are at. A woman I could hold close, listen to her day, massage her shoulders to relive the stresses of her week or maybe even rub her feet if she wasn't ticklish. Maybe it's going for a walk in the park, sitting on the beach as the waves crash the surf or something as simple as sitting on the couch watching TV.

Maybe someone that would love to escape for a weekend, share some passion, excitement and just touch one another in ways that keep you thinking about them for the rest of the week and beyond.

What ever happened to all of these types of thoughts, values and experiences?

This 48 year old Caucasian male who's 6'2" comes with blond hair and blue eyes and a medium build who would love to meet someone who's open to exploring this adventure once we both feel comfortable with one another. Identified as "Unique" I'm not only educated but grew up with some old fashioned values, speak, listen and communicate well and possess something that's not seen often. 

"Quality as well and being Genuine" 

I'm a non smoker, drink on occasion in a social setting. Affectionate and caring who works a busy schedule but wants to take time out to be with someone. A business owner who's smart, intelligent and a man with common sense. All part of a northern upbringing from an exceptional family that just doesn't exist anymore due to their passing.

A man that will stand by your side and make you laugh till it hurts. Remember that growing up?

A lover of water, dining, bowling, pool, swimming, movies, music and the most important "Romance". 

Please: no games, no dating sites, no verification sites. I've seen it all on here, heard it all and ask myself why? all the time. Lets just share a photo, a few emails then our phone numbers and meet. Whether it's just an hour or it turns in to 3 hours. It's really the best way in getting to know of your interests.

Till your reply.
Your Knight in Shining Armor.

title: Anything You Can Do, I Can Do Taller...
text:
So... I'm not great with talking about myself at length, but here it goes anyway. I'm 23 years old, 6"2" 170 pounds with an athletic build, clean (drug and disease free; and you need to be too), and I have long dark hair. I'd also like to preface by saying that race, height, and weight aren't big deals to me. So, that being said...

I'd describe myself as being quiet, perceptive, open minded, spontaneous, wordy, funny/corny-I WILL find a way to make you laugh-down to earth, easygoing and kind-hearted to a fault. A sense of humor is important; I seem to almost always be trying to make people smile. I'm also a die-hard romantic; a firm believer in chivalry; I pride myself on being a gentleman; and I always make time for that special someone. I'm originally from Manhattan, but I've spent most of my life in South Florida. I graduated high school as salutatorian and class president, and I'm currently a student majoring in English, with a minor in European History, at the University of West Florida (UWF). Literature brings me to life-The Picture of Dorian Gray is my Holy Bible, and "The Raven" is my Lord's Prayer. It's my dream to make a career out of writing, however, if need be I can find work in publishing and film through my connections.

As for my interests, I enjoy Netflix/Hulu, 420, reading, writing, video games, science and the nature of the universe in general, and doing anything out of the ordinary if granted the opportunity-I believe that boredom is the catalyst to the realization that a change is necessary. I'm somewhat of a nerd. I firmly believe that Lord of the Rings will always be better than Star Wars, just as I also believe that Batman is the one man capable of beating Superman (dispute me if you must). When it comes to music, my favorite band is Nightwish, but I also like Aerosmith, Elliott Smith, Florence and the Machine, Steam Powered Giraffe, Miracle of Sound, Postmodern Jukebox, Within Temptation, etc...

As for my intentions... I'm recently home from college for the time being, and I'm looking for someone to help make the next chapter of my life a more interesting one. I don't expect to find true love here, so, for now I'm searching in the realm of possibility for someone whom I can just be with comfortably, laugh with hysterically, and be thrilled by in otherwise dull moments. Most of all I want to find the love of my life, despite the odds. I don't expect to find this much, but being single I've nothing to lose, so why not try?

If you want to know anything else, just ask:)

title: Single dad looking to get married...
text:
Hi,

I've been single and dating, but haven't met the right one yet. I don't get out as much as I would like, so it's difficult to meet new people, so I'm using Craigslist as another venue of meeting people. Ultimately, I am looking to get married. I'm not the serial dating kind of guy and hope to find the right match who is also looking for a long term relationship. 

Please note I'm looking for someone who can relocate to the Raleigh, NC area.

I like to think of myself as an easy going, laid back kind of guy. I love to laugh and have a pretty good sense of humor; I can be a bit sarcastic at times too. I like to think of myself as one of the "good guys" and that I have a lot of the qualities women look for. . . see below!

I have an incredible 7 year old daughter who means the world to me and is a big part of my life whom I share custody of with her mother. 

The past 7 years have been hectic to say the least. I spent the majority of my time focusing on my daughter and doing projects around the house I purchased in '09. Now that my goofball is getting older and the projects around the house are just about completed, I finally have time to myself and hopefully I can meet someone to spend time with, possibly start a relationship and with a little luck, share my life with. It would be nice to meet someone with a little one in the 5-8 year range! We have a pool in the back yard and live a block away from one of the best elementary schools in the area.

Some of the things I enjoy are spending time with my daughter, anything to do with the outdoors such as camping, fishing, boating, motorcycles, trips to the beach and back yard barbecues. Like most, I enjoy a night out with friends, dinner/drinks, catching a movie, live band or just staying in on a cold night, having dinner and curling up with someone special and watching a movie.

I would like to meet someone that is honest, caring, silly at times, and has a good sense of humor as well; Someone who understands that communication and trust are part of the foundation for a solid relationship. And someone who considers themselves a true romantic and believes that it's the little things in a relationship that are important.

Now on to some of those qualities I mentioned. . .

1. I can fix stuff! Not only can I fix stuff, but I can do so without involving the police, ambulances or insurance companies! Computers, cars, home repairs and especially toddler toys!
2. I can reach stuff that's high and also put the ornament on top of the tree without a ladder!
3. I'm a gentleman. . . with values and morals. I'm also kind, considerate and caring.
4. I'm in the process of raising the most incredible, intelligent, well-mannered, beautiful little girl and I haven't broken her yet!
5. I have never been unfaithful to anyone I've dated and can promise you that you would not be the first.
6. I'm in touch with my feminine side. . . you, me, candles, a hot bubble bath and bottle of wine is the perfect way to spend an evening. Bath toys, including a rubber ducky are optional.
7. I truly believe that the small gestures in a relationship are important. . . (and something I miss)
8. I understand that a relationship is 50/50 and that it requires communication, trust and honesty.
9. I love animals. Right now, we have a 75 gallon community fish tank, a year and a half old sable German Shepherd and a ball python. Yes, my daughter wanted a snake... she's that cool :)
10. I can cook! I'm not a chef, but I enjoy cooking and trying new recipes. Again, haven't broken my daughter yet :)
11. I love cuddling :)

Also, I typically try to work out regularly, but have been slacking and just started going again. I'm 6'2, 225 lbs and on the athletic/muscular side. I'm not a gym rat, I'm just trying to keep myself in a shape other than round. I have a love/hate relationship with the gym, but at this age, it's a necessary evil.

With that being said, there are a few physical features that I tend to find attractive and look for in a woman. In no particular order: Long hair. . . it's something I've always found attractive in a woman and typically notice first; eyes, smile and fitness. . . I do prefer a woman who falls into the slim to average category. More importantly, I'm looking for a woman who has values, morals and considers themselves "good people". 

If you would like to talk, you know what to do :)

title: How's this for a first date?
text:
It is early morning as you are on the way to the airport, sitting in the back of the SUV he sent for you, you see the sun rising . You notice as you drive to the airport the crystal blue skies as the sun rises to start a new day! 

As you pull up the gate opens to let you on the airport grounds you pull around and notice the Falcon jet waiting, door open and steps down. The drivers stops and comes around to open your door and let you out of the SUV. The pilot walks over to greet you and helps with your bag. He takes your light bag and let's you climb aboard the waiting jet. Excited you take your first step into the jet not sure what is around the corner but willing to find out.

You turn to the right and pass the galley. The aircraft is larger than you pictured it from outside. You notice seating for 8. All you really care about is seating for 2. You sit down and wait for your date, looking through a magazine as you wait. 

Your date boards the aircraft; he is tall 6', 175 lbs, blue eyes, athletic build, great smile, he gives you a firm hug and a kiss. You sit down in the plush leather chairs and notice the flowers on the table in front of you. In it is a card that reads. "Welcome aboard, this is the start of a great ride" 

It is 6.30, early yet perfect to take off to destination unknown. 

You have talked to him on the phone, met for drinks and emailed over a period of time and feel you have really gotten to know him, you feel comfortable with him and are ready for this new, fun and exciting adventure. 

The pilot gives you a quick rundown on the safety features shuts the door and heads to the flight deck. You hear the 3 engines start and you slowly start to head out towards the runway. 

You Taxi to the North and stop just short of the runway, it is a wonderful day for flying. You watch as other planes land and you see the small Cessna in front of you head down the run way to take off. 

The Plane slowly makes a turn to the active runway pointing south. You hear the engines getting louder and you slowly start to roll you feel the force of this wonderful aircraft take you down the runway. It seems like only a minute and you 
are airborne! The city is below you as you climb out. 

The climb-out is smooth, the sun is shining and the clouds look like candy as you climb out. You notice that the aircraft is turning to the East. Once again you ask yourself where I am going. 

The conversation is great. You both are comfortable talking about anything and everything from kids to family to dreams. You laugh and enjoy each others company. 

As the plane reaches cruise the screens around the aircraft light up to show where you are and where the closest towns are, it lets you know speed but fails to give you a location of where you will wind up. 

You have a light breakfast and a toast of Champagne to start the day. 

You wonder where we are going. Did I pack the right clothes.... 

In the end it does not matter, you know in your heart you have finally found him. The ride on the plane is like the ride of life, a few bumps along the way.

It does not matter how many bumps there are as long as the person sitting next to you is holding your hand. 

Life is short, enjoy the ride!

It's important that you either live closeby or are willing to travel to my house so that my 2hour daily commute doesn't get any longer.

title: Until The End of Time
text:
I'm so weary of meeting women who say that they don't need a man. I am a strong, sensitive and giving man who likes to be needed. I receive alot of satisfaction from emotionally pampering a woman and letting her lean on me. Show me your vulnerable side and I'll finally have a purpose...a purpose to keep a smile on a good woman. 

I don't want an affluent/busy career woman who is buried in her smartphone and overscheduled life. If you struggle to "make time" for a man, then you're already too busy for me! A hurried and distracted woman isn't ready for the life of closeness, passion and travel that I dream of.

I would be much happier with an everyday woman living a quiet and uncluttered life with very few responsibilities....a woman who sympathizes with my long daily commute and thinks I'm worth the drive.

You've found a faithful, loyal and honest Midwestern man of integrity looking for a good woman who is ready to completely trust again.

I define "a good woman" not in terms of education or money or beauty...to the contrary!
My desire is to find a beautiful mind and a burning heart.

I own a house in a woodsy and desirable Davie/Ft. Lauderdale neighborhood. I will be eternally grateful to the woman who makes a home in my special world.

Please be willing to drive to Davie and work towards sharing life together in my home.
I spend 2hrs per day commuting to Miami, so you've gotta live close or be willing to travel. I'm not selfish...I'm just trying not to spend all day in the car.

Consider me a 52yr old empty-nester, medical professional and musician that has a lot of love to give and alot to offer.
I promise you that you'll never find a man of greater emotional depth.

Best of all, you'll find me to be a nurturing and purely romantic man yearning to bring joy to a kindred spirit for the rest of our days. 

I am serious about this and I wish I could really find a sweet woman for the rest of my life. Is that you? 


I know alot of us seem to be okay with the idea of going solo these days, but that's something I just refuse to believe.
Life is too wonderful to walk through this world all alone.
Take my hand and we'll try to find love again!



I enjoy writing poetry...this one seemed appropriate for the occasion:

TRUE BLUE HEART


Can a true blue heart shine just as bright-
If it sparkles in no one else's eyes?
No witness to this day's dance of light,
My emotions, my laughs, my cries.

Unshared memories, beautiful moments
Overlooked in haste.
Like teardrops in the ocean,
Diamonds in the waste.

Lift the covers from your feelings,
Expose your insecure spots.
Show the world what you're made of-
Share the bravest of your thoughts.

The things that we're concealing
Will never let us grow.
To throw ourselves wide open
Can bring us more than we'll ever know.

Open up your arms!
You can show your heart's still true.
Even if the color's almost gone-
A Hue of Faded Blue.

Darrin

title: Looking For...
text:
I came here, June 2nd 2014, from Washington state. I'm looking for anything from friends, to casual fun, to the love of my life. I'm just rolling with whatever happens, hoping for the best, and seeing where I end up.

I have a very direct personality. Never had kids, smoked, or been on drugs. Never will. I'm intelligent because I've learned the secret to intelligence. The eagerness to learn and the willingness to be wrong. Evolution requires fallibility. I spend a lot of time on my smartphone researching everything. (Android all the way. iOS is garbage.) I'm quick to research anything new. I'm strong willed and never give up. My energy is off the charts. Once you get me outdoors, especially on some good trails, it's nearly impossible to get me back inside. I can laugh about damn near anything, which is amazing given all I've been through...though maybe it's because of all I've been.

My hobbies include a wide range of outdoor activities like camping and hiking, mountains and beaches. At home I'm a gamer who watches a lot of movies and TV shows, when not playing with my dog, Sadey. She's an American Staffordshire Terrier (pit bull) and she's friggin amazing. We've been through everything together.

I want it all. Compatibility, intelligence, beauty, friendship, chemistry, energy, love, great sex, loyalty, and a mutual drive to do what's right. I'm not interested in addicts, theists, or parents.

As for me, I've got only one thing to offer. Me. Fortunately, that's quite a bit. I've struggled far more than most can ever imagine. It's made me stronger, smarter, and kinder than the rest. Generous, passionate, and stubborn.

In no particular order, some philosophies I live by...

"All that is necessary for evil to triumph is for good men to do nothing."

"Everyone is guilty of all the good they did not do."

"Chance favors the prepared mind."

"If you want a happy ending, it depends on where you stop the story."

"Nothing we do matters, so all that matters is what we do."

"Evolution requires fallibility."

I'd also like to preface by saying that race, height, and weight aren't big deals to me. So, that being said...

I'm also a die-hard romantic; a firm believer in chivalry; I pride myself on being a gentleman; and I always make time for that special someone. I'm originally from Manhattan, but I've spent most of my life in South Florida. I graduated high school as salutatorian and class president, and I'm currently a student majoring in English, with a minor in European History, at the University of West Florida (UWF). Literature brings me to life-The Picture of Dorian Gray is my Holy Bible, and "The Raven" is my Lord's Prayer. As for my interests, I enjoy Netflix/Hulu, 420, reading, writing, video games, science and the nature of the universe in general, and doing anything out of the ordinary if granted the opportunity-I believe that boredom is the catalyst to the realization that a change is necessary. When it comes to music, my favorite band is Nightwish, but I also like Aerosmith, Elliott Smith, Florence and the Machine, Steam Powered Giraffe, Miracle of Sound, Postmodern Jukebox, Within Temptation, etc...

As for my intentions... I'm recently home from college for the time being, and I'm looking for someone to help make the next chapter of my life a more interesting one. I don't expect to find true love here, so, for now I'm searching in the realm of possibility for someone whom I can just be with comfortably, laugh with hysterically, and be thrilled by in otherwise dull moments.
